sentences.sContent: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.sContent_eng: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.sCn: 但您只能在实现所有方法的情况下获得最大收益，因为它们的力量来自它们之间的交互。

sentences.sContent: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.sContent_eng: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.sCn: 但您只有在实现所有方法的情况下才能获得最多的收益，因为它们的力量来自于它们之间的相互作用。

sentences.sContent: The real power of the concept comes not from any one of these devices; it emerges from the interaction of all of them.
sentences.sContent_eng: The real power of the concept comes not from any one of these devices; it emerges from the interaction of all of them.
sentences.sCn: 这个概念的很正力量并不来自于这些设备的任何一个；它来自于这些设备之间的交互。

sentences.sContent: ...This undoubtedly mins the quality of social interaction that we need as human beings...
...It is due to the lack of face-to-face interaction with teachers and classmates that people will feel isolated and gradually lose basic social skills...
...e-learning can't offer human interaction in real life...
...researchers are increasingly discovering benefits of gender interaction in youth...
...The students turned what could have been a passive interaction into an active one...
...A key process in interpersonal interaction is that of social comparison...

phrases.pCn: 社会互动；社会干预；社会的相互作用
互动过程；相互作用过程
互动分析；相互影响分件；交互分析

相互作用参数；相互酌参数

remMethod.val: inter(在…之间， 相互) ＋ act(行动) ＋ ion → 相互作用

trans.tranOther: a process by which two or more things affect each other
